attributes.action: help secure the future of The Real Hotel Company PLC and help get us out of Administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The real hotel company has recently gone into administration, several hotels have already been closed, the undersigned petition the prime minister to offer help to the real hotel company plc to secure the jobs of the workers at the many hotels, as well as helping the business men and women who stay at the Real Hotel Company PLC hotels whilst on business.
